affected COVID: Viral pneumonia caused by SARS-CoV-2 infection. Characterized by bilateral peripheral ground-glass opacities, crazy-paving pattern, and posterior lung consolidation on CT. May progress to ARDS in severe cases.
not affected COVID: Designation indicating absence of SARS-CoV-2-related pneumonia. Includes: 1) normal lungs, 2) other pulmonary pathologies (bacterial pneumonia, influenza, COPD), or 3) non-respiratory conditions. Requires negative molecular (PCR) or antigen testing confirmation.
